casebody.data:
No. 10-1104. Margaret Minneci, et al., Petitioners v. Richard Lee Pollard, et al. 563 U.S. 987, 131 S. Ct. 2449,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1208,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3664. May 16, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit granted.

Same case below, 607 F.3d 583 and 629 F.3d 843.
